hikes.title: Piper At The Gates of Dawn
hikes.description: A live  album by the English progressive rock band originally released in 1995, on the label EMI in the United Kingdom.

hikes.title: Dilate
hikes.description: Her highest-selling and most acclaimed album, released in 1996.

hikes.title: Axis Bold As Love
hikes.description: Second studio album by the English-American band, released in 1967.
